direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the bag's contents by adding or removing elements, handling counts similarly.
Both methods interact with the bag's elements and handle similar control flows, though one modifies and the other queries.
Both methods access the bag's elements, though one modifies and the other retrieves a set of unique elements.
Both methods involve validation of elements, with similar exception handling mechanisms.

enhanced_by.reason: The factory method initializes the bag with a predicate, setting up the state required for the add method.
The validate method is invoked before adding an element, ensuring the element meets the predicate's criteria.
The getCount method can be used to verify the count of elements after an add operation, ensuring the operation was successful.
